name: Michelangelo
what_did:
Michelangelo painted the ceiling of the Sistine Chapel and carved the statue of David.
He was a master at making art look alive and full of emotion.
He also worked as an architect and poet.
why_matters:
Michelangelo’s art is some of the most famous in the world.
He helped shape the Renaissance, a time of big changes in art and thinking.
His work still inspires artists today.

questions.q: What famous statue did he sculpt?
What kind of work did Michelangelo do?
What time period did he help shape?

options: He made amazing art that people still admire

fun_fact: Michelangelo didn’t like painting — he thought of himself mostly as a sculptor!
